user_query: I want to name my newborn cat after a famous song. Can you help me find song lyrics and comments related to the song 'Hotel California'? Also, provide me with the basic information of the song from Soundcloud.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the lyrics for the song 'Hotel California'.
Fetch comments related to the song 'Hotel California'.
Get the basic information of the song 'Hotel California' from Soundcloud.
